root.name: Linda³ Again
root.description: OverviewLinda³ Again is a remake of a PC-Engine CD RPG which was titled Linda³ from 1995. The remake featured several gameplay improvements as well as a completely redone presentation with new animated cut-scenes and updated character designs by Tatsuyuki Tanaka. MARS Corporation co-developed Linda³ Again with Alfa System and SCEI published the title for the PlayStation in 1997. In 1998 a port for the Sega Saturn was released by ASCII Entertainment which was, for whatever reason, titled just Linda³.
